Name: What's My Gender?
About the game: Do you lack motivation for learning grammatical genders, or would you like to try learning new words just for fun? What's My Gender gives you a tool for daily learning. Use 5-7 minutes of your day to efficiently memorize words and return again next day for rewards. Gadgets will help you learn more difficult words and the game brings you reward images for correct answers, all the while being tormented by mean taunts from old people. If you do not fancy the images, you can create and easily load your own reward image packs. Also contains secrets for the curious minds. The game has four default languages for learning: German, Italian, French, Spanish. You may also create your own additional language packs. 18 reward poses + 8 Unlockable with progress 3 Unlockable style variations with progress 38 Unlockable Animated Icons 90 Unlockable Portfolio photos (days in a row unlock) Unlockable Pro Mode for challenging play, unlocked from a challenge Additional difficult extra challenges (days in a row unlock) Image slice reducing camera items unlocked from challenges 9 Blue gadgets and 3 passive pink gadgets Additional Special Coins Unlockable mini-content Hidden Bonus Content that includes game completion Your own images and word pack support Gadgets can be purchased with blue and pink balls that you gain as rewards. The available gadgets change daily in the shop. Submerge yourself into the dreamy world of What's My Gender and make your retirement days useful by learning a language or two before you kick the bucket.
